OOC: Oops, sorry, missed your reposting :)

> Hydras hissed "i have an impo=
rtant task for you Cyclonus: I want you to insolate the resheach area, made=
 it impossible to someone come in and out... and leave the acces signature =
in blank... I'll fill it when you finish; Perceptor will start soon to do s=
ome importan reseach and I want  it that no body mess with. I want that you=
 do that asap; I'll ask Rodimus to continue tracking the situation in the a=
rk" then he opened his comlink and said "Rodimus, i need you here in Seguri=
ty Room, Cyclonus will up date you"


Cyclonus looked at Hydras quizzically=
 and then nodded. "Of course." he
said, stowed his transmitter away in a sa=
fe place as he did so.

Scourge walked up behind Cyclonus, as if ready to f=
ollow his commander
should the need arise. "I wonder why the Maximals have =
not come out in
bigger numbers to defend their Ark?" Scourge said under his=
 breath.

Looking over at Scourge, Cyclonus nodded, "The thought had occurr=
ed to
me as well." he said thoughtfully.

********************************
=

Meanwhile . . .

> Nightlight smiled and slighty blushed when Rodimus took=
 her hand and shyly smiled but that smile fades when she  heard Hydras requ=
est and said "if you have to go to combat, do you promise that will you com=
e back? do you promise that will you take care yourself?"

Rodimus slowly s=
lid his hand from on hers and rose, reluctant to do
so, but he knew where h=
is duty was, and that was with Hydras. He
nodded to her, a confident smile =
blooming on his face, "I will be
back." his voice as confident as his smile=
, "I've got to make sure you
are up on your feet right?"

With a hesitant w=
ave he turned to leave the room, making sure that it
was locked secure as h=
e left. Only those with the proper clearance
would be able to get through t=
he door. He quickly began his swift walk
towards Hydras' location as he act=
ivated his radio, "I'm on my way."
he said.

As he walked, he frowned, "I'm=
 reporting to Cyclonus?" Rodimus said in
a voice too low to be heard by the=
 radio. "Over my deactivated
chassis."

(TAG)

Preston
